headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://*; font-src 'self'; connect-src 'self'; media-src 'self' https://storage.googleapis.com; object-src 'none'; frame-src 'self'; worker-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests; block-all-mixed-content;
